body_content.explanation: relating to a restaurant where customers collect high-quality freshly prepared food from a counter (= a long flat surface), and are not served at tables:
examples: New York City is packed with great restaurants - from fast casual to ultra high end.
The meeting will be an informal gathering at a trendy fast casual restaurant.
The company made its name in fast-casual dining, a growing segment that fits somewhere between fast-food and full-service.
